text: The canton of Brebières is an administrative division of the Pas-de-Calais department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Brebières.Décret n° 2014-233 du 24 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département du Pas-de-Calais It consists of the following communes: #Arleux-en-Gohelle #Bellonne #Biache-Saint-Vaast #Boiry-Notre-Dame #Brebières #Cagnicourt #Corbehem #Dury #Étaing #Éterpigny #Fresnes-lès- Montauban #Fresnoy-en-Gohelle #Gouy-sous-Bellonne #Hamblain-les-Prés #Haucourt #Hendecourt-lès-Cagnicourt #Izel-lès-Équerchin #Neuvireuil #Noyelles-sous- Bellonne #Oppy #Pelves #Plouvain #Quiéry-la-Motte #Récourt #Rémy #Riencourt- lès-Cagnicourt #Rœux #Sailly-en-Ostrevent #Saudemont #Tortequesne #Villers- lès-Cagnicourt #Vis-en-Artois #Vitry-en-Artois ==References== Category:Cantons of Pas-de-Calais
title: Canton of Brebières
